name: Spright Carrot
effectText: If you control a Level/Link 2 monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Spright Carrot" once per turn this way. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 other Level/Rank/Link 2 monster; negate that effect, then if you Tributed a Rank/Link 2 monster to activate this effect, you can destroy that card. You can only use this effect of "Spright Carrot" once per turn.
